item.title: Keeping Calm in Krabi Town
item.description: We needed an escape plan out of Patong and decided it was time to make our way to Krabi. It was actually quite easy â€“ we hopped on a bus from Patong back to Phuket, and from there we caught a local bus going to Krabi. It only took 3 hours, we were just so glad to be far away from Patong! Cool claw sculpture near the river Krabi town oozed the space and calm we needed for a couple of nights till we planned our next move.
